1.title: No Mo' Nicknames

episode of.title: Flavor of Love Girls: Charm School (TV Series 2007)

1.plot: Thirteen of the rudest Flavorettes are back -- returning from Flavor of Love season one comes Smiley the crier, Serious the model, Goldie the puker, Pumkin the spitter, Rain the screamer, and crazy Hottie; and from season two comes Saaphyri the fighter, Bootz the hater, ghetto talkin' Buckwild, plus-size Like Dat, balcony-busting Buckeey & Krazy, and Toasteee, the drunk girl who did porn.

2.title: Dirty Drawers Done Dirt Cheap

episode of.title: Flavor of Love Girls: Charm School (TV Series 2007)

2.plot: This week the twelve remaining girls get trained in social grace, etiquette, and table manners. Special guest Andrew Firestone (of The Bachelor) tests the girls in a three round competition.

3.title: Big Titty-Girl No No

episode of.title: Flavor of Love Girls: Charm School (TV Series 2007)

3.plot: This week the eleven remaining girls learn about high fashion when they have to split into two teams and put on a fashion show. First, each team much assign each person's role: two dress designers, one girl to do hair, one to do make-up, and one girl to be the model. They are told to choose their roles wisely, but one team does everything but, seemingly assigning people to jobs they are least suited for. At the fashion show the judges are knocked out by one team, and horrified by the other. Slapped with a hearty dose of reality, members of the losing team start ...

4.title: Master Debaters

episode of.title: Flavor of Love Girls: Charm School (TV Series 2007)

4.plot: This week the ten remaining girls learn about effective communication when they split into two teams for a formal debate.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: Flavor of Love Girls: Charm School (TV Series 2007)

5.plot: This week the nine remaining girls learn about business acumen in this Apprentice-style challenge where they split into three teams to see who can make the most money selling their custom-made perfume on the streets of Hollywood. Three of the girls are selected to be team CEO's, and they must fight between them to decide who is on their team. When one of the CEO's gets bullied by the other two, she's forced to take the two girls no one else wanted. The team who makes the most money will be safe from elimination, and the two CEO's of the losing teams will be ...

6.title: Give and Take

episode of.title: Flavor of Love Girls: Charm School (TV Series 2007)

6.plot: This week the eight remaining girls learn about generosity when Mo challenges them to give away their own clothes to a thrift store that benefits AIDS research.

7.title: It's Mo's Birthday and I'll Cry If I Want To

episode of.title: Flavor of Love Girls: Charm School (TV Series 2007)

7.plot: After a controversial expulsion ceremony, the girls revolt. Ricki must take back control of the school and teach these girls how to get along before this latest semester of Charm School comes to an untimely end.

8.title: The Prom

episode of.title: Flavor of Love Girls: Charm School (TV Series 2007)

8.plot: This week the five remaining girls learn about the four types of men to avoid in relationships: the Player (charismatic), the Professional (wealthy), the Pushover (sensitive), and the Parolee (high sexual aptitude).

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: Flavor of Love Girls: Charm School (TV Series 2007)

10.title: Ghettin' Phabulous

episode of.title: Flavor of Love Girls: Charm School (TV Series 2007)

10.plot: In the Charm School season finale, the final four girls compete in a game-show style Q&A to see who has learned the most throughout the season.

11.title: Reunion

episode of.title: Flavor of Love Girls: Charm School (TV Series 2007)

11.plot: All the girls are back for the first ever Charm School Class Reunion.

imdb.title: Flavor of Love Girls: Charm School
plot: This 'Flavor Of Love' Spin-Off puts the ladies to be trained in proper etiquette and having their social skills put to the test.::Anonymous
